description: RCA universal remote controls have the ability to learn and store commands from your original remotes and set up macro function that let you execute a sequesnce of commands with a single keypress. The RCR6473R features expanded DVD and DVR capabilities, device mode indicators, glow keys, menu and guide support.  Also skip forward and back, slow motion, brand and manual code search libraries or direct code entry mode.  Requires two AAA batteries which are not included.
title: RCA 6 Device Universal Remote Control (RCR6473R)
